examples.example: 我们要努力学习科学知识，用科学的力量让生活变得更加美好。

translate.english: We should study scientific knowledge hard and use the power of science to make life more beautiful.

examples.example: 科学的思维方式帮助我们更好地理解和探索这个奇妙的世界。

translate.english: The scientific way of thinking helps us better understand and explore this wonderful world.

examples.example: 科学的进步为人类带来了诸多便利和惊喜。

translate.english: The progress of science has brought many conveniences and surprises to human beings.
